item.title: Setting up Elasticsearch with Docker Compose for Indexing Files on NAS
item.description: If you have a NAS (Samba) and want to index files, Elasticsearch is an excellent solution. However, setting up Elasticsearch with Docker Compose can be a bit challenging. In this post, we will outline the necessary steps to set up Elasticsearch with Docker Compose. The desired state is Elasticsearch and Kibana to get a web interface to manage users/roles/indexes.
